title: Remarkable value. Unbeatable location!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Make yourself comfortable at Renaissance Apartment Homes, where luxury, elegance, and style are the norm.
Our apartments in Santa Rosa, CA, promise a unique apartment living experience, thanks to the rich host of deluxe amenities, designer-inspired interiors, together with a well-located address.
We aim to have you and your entire household—including pets—experience a poignant sense of home.
If your dream apartment home features a gourmet kitchen, private patio/ balcony, teardrop lighting, large walk-in closets, and beautiful mountain views—you’re in the right place!
Each apartment is fully renovated and additionally includes electric fireplaces, central heat and air conditioning, full-size washer & dryer, and much more.
Your high-end living experience goes beyond the four walls of your apartment, though.

On our premises, you get to wiggle your toes in the sparkling swimming pool, bond with friends or neighbors at the pool-side community BBQ, pamper yourself at the soothing spa or enjoy the fully-equipped fitness center—the options are endless.
You’ll love our excellent location, too, that puts you near everywhere you want and need to be.
Quick and easy commutes are granted, thanks to our fast access to Redwood Hwy, Luther Burbank Memorial Hwy, as well as public transportation.
Downtown Santa Rosa is within 2 miles from us, and you can also easily reach Rohnert Park in moments.
Get to Santa Rosa Junior College under 10 minutes, watch the newest blockbuster at Roxy Stadium 14 or visit the latest exhibitions at Art Alley—each venue is conveniently close.
Embrace the ultimate in comfort and choose luxury.
Contact us for more information about our apartments in Santa Rosa, CA—one of them could be your new home in no time!
Pets - Max 2 allowed, Rent $50.00, Deposit $500.00Comments: Please call for breed and other restrictions
